Uses of Interface
interfaces.IMessageReceiver

  • Packages that use IMessageReceiver 
    Package Description
    interfaces  
    service.provider.tcp  
    service.provider.udp  

    • Uses of IMessageReceiver in interfaces

      Methods in interfaces with parameters of type IMessageReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IServiceProvider.startListening(java.lang.String endPoint, IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      This method enables a tcp to listen for messages on the given endpoint.

    • Uses of IMessageReceiver in service.provider.tcp

      Methods in service.provider.tcp with parameters of type IMessageReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void ClientProvider.awaitMessage(IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      Creates a separate thread which only task is to write messages to the server.
      private void ClientProvider.establishConnection(IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      Creates a separate thread which only task is to connect to the server by sending a connect message to it.
      private void ServerProvider.startAccepting(int port, IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      This method is used when server starts to initialize a listener for incoming connections and messages from clients.
      void ServerProvider.startListening(java.lang.String endPoint, IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      This method takes an endpoint and message receiver and passes them to startAccepting to initialize a listener.
      void ClientProvider.startListening(java.lang.String endPoint, IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      This methods purpose is to create a socket binding by establishing a connection to the server.
      private void ServerProvider.startResponding(Client client, IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      Creates a separate thread which will communicate with the incoming clients.

    • Uses of IMessageReceiver in service.provider.udp

      Methods in service.provider.udp with parameters of type IMessageReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void P2PProvider.startListening(java.lang.String endPoint, IMessageReceiver messageReceiver)
      This method creates a separate thread on which it awaits an incoming request.
